sentences.sContent: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation.
sentences.sCn: 他决定把余生奉献给科学研究。

sentences.sContent: Considerable resources have been devoted to proving him a liar.
sentences.sCn: 大量的资源已被用来证明他是个撒谎者。

remMethod.val: de + vote(投票) → 把票全投给那个候选者 → 将…奉献给

words.tran: 虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的
献身于…；致力于…（devote的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: If you devote yourself, your time, or your energy to something, you spend all or most of your time or energy on it
